name: Blindly Onward
description:
Some dreams are pleasant, some dreams are terrifying. In the latter case you just want to wake up. But what if you can’t? 

Luna is trapped in her nightmare and the only way to exit is the way she came: by getting into her bed. Navigate through the twisted dream image of her house and avoid the dark creatures looking to keep her trapped to find your way back into the safety of your bed. 

This game was made within 48 hours as an entry in the Manasoup Gamejam 2022. 

W/A/S/D  -  Movement 

Mouse  -  Looking around 

E  -   Flashlight on/off 

Space  -  Closing/opening your eyes

Things game contains depictions of spiders.
